title: n172 Old Judge Sowders (KC) for sale
author: shammus

posts.post_title: n172 Old Judge Sowders (KC) for sale
posts.post_content:
Tougher player from a tough team to find cards from.  Great looking example though.  Photo is sharper in person than it appears in the scan even.  Very little wear on the card, although there is some paper stuck to the back as seen in the scan.  No damage to the back, however.  Looking for $250 delivered....
